DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD IN BRIEF : MEXICO ; PRESIDENT PUSHES AMNESTY FOR REBELS
DOC.TEXT: President Carlos Salinas de Gortari said he wants a general amnesty for all sides in a conflict in the southern state of Chiapas and ordered a special_session of the Mexican Congress to consider the plan . He said the offer will give rebels who launched a New Year ' s Day uprising for indigenous rights no excuse not to lay_down their arms . The newspaper La Jornada said the rebels , known as the Zapatista National Liberation Army , will respond to the government ' s call_for dialogue soon and listed some of their goals .
